content: The log.txt used for recording is transferred to the log.json file with python and some artificial modifications.
content_list: Added Log page style and layout settings, and progress bar style planning.
Concatenate Json to get update log data.
Translate the content of the update log to achieve the purpose of multilingual switching. (Source: myself, dictionaries, and Google Translate complement each other.)
Added layout settings for the website.
Modify the style of blog pages.
Make individual lightbox enlargements without using kits.
Added to determine whether there is i18n display.

content: Added a page to modify resources.

content_list: Added filtering and automatic counting functions.
Add tags, automatic counting of portfolio categories.
Layout the pages of the portfolio.
Added category Filter to use Radio Button.
Change the individual layout of the blog directory.
Keep the Blog Title separate from the Portfolio Title.
Add a link to the work.
Modify the switching animation color effect.
Set Tag style, routing settings and Filter to display tagged articles.
Routes reset from nested routes to new directions. (Because the original structure is nested, if it is nested again, there will be serious bugs and sometimes it will not be displayed.)
Added previous and next function button styles.
Added Tags page and function, and automatically counted the number of Tags.
Adjust the layout of the post (Tag moved to the bottom right).
Modify the error page display style.
Added previous and next function buttons.
Added reading time and word count statistics.
Introduce @nuxtjs/moment in nuxt.js to calculate days and format time.
The currently used language (localePath) can be saved when switching pages.
Added Visibilitychange to follow the page event to change the title.
Automatically load cookies Switch language and local storage theme.

content: Officially moved from Vue3 Cli to Vue2 Nuxt.js.
content_list: Added the ability to switch themes.

content: Try to move the existing project to Nuxt, and move while getting familiar with the Nuxt architecture and routing settings.

Decided to study and practice Nuxt.js first and then come back.
Create a Blog with Nuxt Content first try gogo !
content_list: Set Profile Photo to randomly pick one of two pictures.
Fix the problem that variables will appear if the language is not set at the beginning.
Study how Nuxt.js generates static web pages.
Added a component for the left NavBar.
Added the function of switching languages.
Use the Cli to create the first version of the blog.
